typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExTLdetallesdeordenes
ExTLdetallesdeordenes keyGenerate(output(PK_detalledeordenes as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		PK_detalledeordenes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_DetalleOrden as integer,
		PK_Order as integer,
		Detalle_Orden as string,
		Linea_Total as double,
		Cantidad as decimal(18,5),
		Descuento as decimal(5,5),
		Precio_Unitario as decimal(18,5),
		Ganancia as decimal(18,5),
		PK_Producto as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Almacenarproducto
